verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G4152>spiritual<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G4559>carnal<s%>, even <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G3516>babes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

I have <S%G4222>fed<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G1051>milk<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G1033>meat<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3768>hitherto<s%> ye <S%G1410>were<s%> <S%G3768>not<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> to bear it, <S%G235%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> are ye <S%G1410>able<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3699>whereas<s%> there is <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2205>envying<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2054>strife<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1370>divisions<s%>, are <S%G2075>ye<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3752>while<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G1473%G3303>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> of <S%G3972>Paul<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> am of <S%G625>Apollos<s%>; <S%G2075>are<s%> ye <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>?

<S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G625>Apollos<s%>, <S%G235%G2228>but<s%> <S%G1249>ministers<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G4100>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to every <S%G1538>man<s%>?
<S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G5452>planted<s%>, <S%G625>Apollos<s%> <S%G4222>watered<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> gave the <S%G837>increase<s%>.

<S%G5620>So<s%> then <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he that <S%G5452>planteth<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> he that <S%G4222>watereth<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that giveth the <S%G837>increase<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he that <S%G5452>planteth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G4222>watereth<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2873>labour<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> labourers <S%G4904>together<s%> with <S%G2316>God<s%>: ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G1091>husbandry<s%>, ye are <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G3619>building<s%>.

<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G753>masterbuilder<s%>, I have <S%G5087>laid<s%> the <S%G2310>foundation<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G2026>buildeth<s%> thereon. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G991>let<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G2026>buildeth<s%> thereupon.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that is <S%G2749>laid<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> if any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G2026>build<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G696>silver<s%>, <S%G5093>precious<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%>, <S%G3586>wood<s%>, <S%G5528>hay<s%>, <S%G2562>stubble<s%>;

Every <S%G1538>man's<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> shall <S%G1213>declare<s%> it, <S%G3754>because<s%> it shall be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4442>fire<s%> shall <S%G1381>try<s%> every <S%G1538>man's<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of what <S%G3697>sort<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%>.
If any <S%G1536>man's<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he hath <S%G2026>built<s%> thereupon, he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> a <S%G3408>reward<s%>.

If any <S%G1536>man's<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> shall be <S%G2618>burned<s%>, he shall suffer <S%G2210>loss<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>; <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%>.

Know <S%G1492>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>?

If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G5351>defile<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G5351>shall<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5351>destroy<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> temple <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%>.

<S%G1818>Let<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>. If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1380>seemeth<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, let him <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3474>fool<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he may <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, He <S%G1405>taketh<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G3834>craftiness<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> the <S%G1261>thoughts<s%> of the <S%G4680>wise<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3152>vain<s%>.
<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> <S%G2744>let<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>;

<S%G1535>Whether<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G625>Apollos<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> things <S%G1764>present<s%>, <S%G1535>or<s%> things to <S%G3195>come<s%>; <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%>;
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> are <S%G5547>Christ's<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2316>God's<s%>.
